title: Power Analysis: 1,000w Sprints and 7w/kg Climbs Crown Champions at the Tour de France Femmes
content:
Diving into the big watts of Demi Vollering, Chloe Dygert, Puck Pieterse, and more to see what it takes to win on the biggest stage.

Read the full article at Power Analysis: 1,000w Sprints and 7w/kg Climbs Crown Champions at the Tour de France Femmes on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
